cn.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

cn.description:
在这款简约爽快的塔防射击游戏中，玩家将化身镇守城池的弓箭塔，直面敌方如火车般沿轨道袭来的攻城车队。敌军每节车厢均携带独立生命值，需通过精准瞄准与快速连射逐一击破——箭无虚发才能阻止其逼近城楼！若敌方车队突破防线抵达塔下，则宣告失败；全歼车厢则逆风翻盘！

游戏以经典轨道推进玩法为核心，操作直观易上手：滑动瞄准、自动放箭，箭矢轨迹与攻速节奏考验你的临场反应。随着关卡推进，可强化弓箭手的攻击力、射速与暴击属性，体验“万箭齐发，摧枯拉朽”的畅快感！

If you are enjoying the ride, we would love your valuable feedback to help us to continue navigating towards providing the best possible learning experience!
cn.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign
Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence

EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT
Access to exclusive offers and discounts!

AWARDS:
• Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018
• As featured on the Gadget Show
• Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024
• App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019
• Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App
• DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year"

CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com

This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

Requires account creation to access content.

*Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full
**Pass Guarantee T&C’s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

hk.description:
### **「簡單但深奧！牌組構築類 Rogue-like 卡牌遊戲！」**  

**「在中世奇幻世界中擊敗深淵首領！」**  
**「選擇職業、收集卡牌，打造最強牌組！」**  

### **遊戲特色**  
**牌組構築 × Rogue-like – 每次遊玩都能利用不同的卡牌，體驗全新的戰鬥！**  
**高分系統 – 刷新最高分，挑戰自己的極限！**  
**無限可玩性 Rogue-like 要素 – 每次遊玩都會帶來全新的發展！**  
**多種可選職業 – 選擇適合自己的戰鬥風格！**  
**單人遊戲 – 依照自己的節奏慢慢享受遊戲！**

Filca 是一款單反膠卷相機。
35種膠卷濾鏡和電影效果讓您的照片栩栩如生。

@veteranUser
"沒有Filca，你只是在收集時刻，
有了Filca，你在保存記憶。"

使用Filca的專家級手動控制精通您的拍攝。

■ 手動模式下的快門速度、ISO、白平衡控制
■ 來自業界領導者如Kodak、Fuji、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡

Filca旨在優化您的快照體驗。
非常適合拍攝人物、自拍、夜景以及捕捉日常生活的微妙美麗。
應用我們的濾鏡，以實現真正的模擬膠片外觀。

主要特性：

帶35mm膠卷濾鏡的自動模式相機
手動模式（曝光和對焦）
對快門速度、ISO的完全控制
各種寬高比：4:3、3:2、16:9、1:1
數字變焦可放大至8倍
手動對焦控制（微距、風景）
來自Fuji、Kodak、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡（包括黑白濾鏡）
膠片顆粒效果
膠片日期打印效果
光學圖像穩定
低功耗模式
自拍模式
EXIF數據存儲（包括位置數據）
人像增強
全分辨率照片
定時器和閃光燈功能
網格模式視圖
專業特性：

白平衡調整功能
日期打印功能
在Instagram上使用#filca分享您的照片，我們期待展示您的作品。
關注我們的Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/

使用條款：https://han.gl/HCCwV
隱私政策：https://han.gl/Wclkw

讓我們與Filca一起提升您的攝影旅程。

hk.trackCensoredName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
hk.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
hk.releaseNotes:
1.修復部分貼圖翻譯問題
2.生成的冥妖的姓氏翻譯問題
3.宗門職位晉升時，大長老職位為空時的貼圖問題
4.醍醐寶典在英文和韓文下不能點擊按鈕的問題
5.優化部分UI在英文的視覺效果
6.修復仙祠無法供奉的BUG
7.修復未購買DLC的提示文案
8.修復某些情況下存檔出現異常的問題。
hk.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

hk.releaseNotes: This update brings big improvements under the hood! We’ve significantly enhanced the stability of Controller for HomeKit and fixed a bunch of bugs to make your experience smoother and more reliable than ever. Thanks for all your feedback - keep it coming!
hk.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.

結合社群網路的渡假村經營遊戲！
目標為打造超受歡迎的渡假設施！

自由自在地擴建泳池，來創造舒適的空間吧。

依照顧客願望建造餐飲店、調製五彩繽紛的池水來令大家心滿意足吧。

當然也能建造陽光明媚的室外泳池。

hk.description:
讓擁有豐富大自然的小島進一步發展，目標是成為遊客數量No.1的度假村！

首先以度假村開幕為目標，建造住宿設施後迎接客人入住。
整頓旅館的周邊環境後，就可以找出深具魅力的旅行方案。盡量增加遊客會喜歡的旅行方案吧！
只要讓度假村變得更多元，或許就能實現遊客的旅遊目的。

在環繞著海洋的小島，美麗的大海也是觀光景點之一。若能和魚兒們多多交流，就能增添更多美好回憶。
設置海草或岩石提升水質，或是將上鉤的魚兒放流，都能提高魚兒在這裡住下來的機會。

如果度假村變得越來越吸引人，也能和委託者洽談開店和商品開發計畫。
盡量推廣度假村的魅力，抓住委託者的心吧！！

蓋一間使用新鮮現摘水果的果汁吧，別忘了在旁邊擺上長椅喔。
若小島誕生了著名景點，可能會有更多遊客蜂擁而至！！

來打造一塊讓遊客們露出燦爛笑容的度假村吧！

hk.description:
勇者傳說將從你的村莊發跡

從草原到雪國，乃至於魔界！可在各式地圖上享受開發村莊的樂趣。建造旅館或武器店、防具店等設施，前來驅逐怪物的冒險者們就會造訪村莊。

將裝備或道具贈送給冒險者，輔助他們完成任務吧。村外偶爾會出現神秘迷宮，怪物也會隨之出現。打倒大量怪物來賺取金錢與經驗值吧。

另外如果村中設施或食物、自然等要點的魅力提高，就會被視為村莊的特徵並獲得稱號。其中或許會有非常稀有的稱號……？

隨著設施與稱號增加，村莊的人氣也提高後，可能還會出現希望擁有舒適小屋的冒險者。
本作也會出現許多獨特的怪物！

只要給予點心來提升友好度，就能騎乘怪物戰鬥，戰力也會隨之上升。

招攬各種怪物成為夥伴，挑戰上級任務吧。另外只要解鎖世界地圖並達成條件，就能在新的土地上建立村莊。

移至不同地區，可能就會有新的冒險者造訪村莊，或許還能遇到未知的強大怪物……？

努力打造出生氣蓬勃的最高級別村莊，讓許多冒險者與夥伴怪物入住吧。

hk.description:
国家天氣Pro（National weather pro) - 即時提供未來15天天氣預報、全球雷達、颱風實時路徑及預報、地震、空氣品質、未來15天（360小時）每小時天氣預報、花粉過敏、釣魚、室外運動、降雨概率、當前即時天氣等功能。無廣告免費天氣App。

****準確、即時、15日天氣預報****
    即時更新當前天氣。
    定位地址精確到街道門牌號，天氣精確到所在位置周邊1.2KM範圍內。
    更新地址，即時更新天氣信息。
    15日全球天氣預報，出行計劃更保障。

****15日（360小時）每小時天氣預報****
    未來15日，每個小時的天氣情況
    每小時支持天氣、溫度、體感溫度、氣壓、紫外線、露點、能見度、風向、風速、雲層覆蓋率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、釣魚指數、運動指數等等
    更細緻準確的出行規劃

****地震****
    支持近200年，共72萬條地震記錄。並即時更新最新地震信息。
    地震可在地圖內展示，提供地震震級、強度、深度，致死率預估、強度圖、影響城市，海嘯、山體滑坡、地震液化等不同等級預警。
    地震數據繁雜難懂，我們提供每個指標的通俗化提示。

****衛星雷達****
    提供颱風等級、運動路徑、影響範圍等在地圖內展示。
    支持雷達、雲圖、24小時降雨量、24小時降雪量、雷電、溫度、體感溫度、紫外線、露點、溫度、駕駛難度信息及未來預報，在地圖上展示。

****Apple Watch****
    支持Apple Watch，以及錶盤複雜功能。

****支持 Widget****
    支持桌面widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度，未來6小時天氣及未來2天天氣預報
    支持鎖屏widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度等。

****花粉過敏預報****
    為花粉過敏用戶提供未來15天的所在位置的花粉過敏信息

****生活指數****
    釣魚：支持未來15天每小時釣魚指數
    運動：支持未來15天每小時運動指數
    是否攜帶雨傘提醒
    防曬指數及提醒
    穿衣指數及提醒
    洗車至少及提醒
    顯示當前日期日曆

****個性、美觀****
    收錄各地美麗風景作為天氣背景圖片，更簡潔美觀
    用戶可以自定義壁紙，更有個性，將您喜愛的圖片設置為天氣背景

取消方法：請用戶手動在蘋果設備【設定】>>【iTunesStore與App Store】>>選擇【Apple ID】>>點擊即【查看Apple ID】>>在賬戶設置界面點擊【訂閱】>>取消國家天氣的訂閱即可。

mo.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

mo.description:
在这款简约爽快的塔防射击游戏中，玩家将化身镇守城池的弓箭塔，直面敌方如火车般沿轨道袭来的攻城车队。敌军每节车厢均携带独立生命值，需通过精准瞄准与快速连射逐一击破——箭无虚发才能阻止其逼近城楼！若敌方车队突破防线抵达塔下，则宣告失败；全歼车厢则逆风翻盘！

游戏以经典轨道推进玩法为核心，操作直观易上手：滑动瞄准、自动放箭，箭矢轨迹与攻速节奏考验你的临场反应。随着关卡推进，可强化弓箭手的攻击力、射速与暴击属性，体验“万箭齐发，摧枯拉朽”的畅快感！

mo.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

自由自在地擴建泳池，來創造舒適的空間吧。

讓擁有豐富大自然的小島進一步發展，目標是成為遊客數量No.1的度假村！

首先以度假村開幕為目標，建造住宿設施後迎接客人入住。
整頓旅館的周邊環境後，就可以找出深具魅力的旅行方案。盡量增加遊客會喜歡的旅行方案吧！

盡量推廣度假村的魅力，抓住委託者的心吧！！

從草原到雪國，乃至於魔界！可在各式地圖上享受開發村莊的樂趣。建造旅館或武器店、防具店等設施，前來驅逐怪物的冒險者們就會造訪村莊。

將裝備或道具贈送給冒險者，輔助他們完成任務吧。村外偶爾會出現神秘迷宮，怪物也會隨之出現。打倒大量怪物來賺取金錢與經驗值吧。

隨著設施與稱號增加，村莊的人氣也提高後，可能還會出現希望擁有舒適小屋的冒險者。

tw.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

us.description:
Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.
【Ascend to the Top with Immortal Cultivation A Journey of a Lifetime】
Step into the enchanting world of the Tale of Immortal, where cultivation is an art that requires more than just financial means and help from fellow cultivators. To truly master it, one must possess a deep understanding of the craft and have access to the right cultivation venues. But that's not all—the journey is fraught with danger, as you'll face unpredictable monsters, crisis-ridden mystic realms, insurmountable barriers, and brilliant treasures waiting to be discovered.
【NPCs with a Life of Their Own AI-Driven Interactive Ecology】
Embrace a fully-realized NPC world, where each character is a unique entity with their own friends, family, and life trajectory— completely independent of your progress. However, if you choose to meddle, you certainly can!
【Surprising Encounters Await Experience a Fascinating Story】
Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure? One where you might become the hero who saves the day and wins the heart of the love of your life? Or maybe you're looking to stir up some jealousy in your crush and have them fight for your affection? How about fulfilling a fifty-year-old promise or getting caught up in the struggle of a mysterious organization? Perhaps you'll uncover a long-forgotten treasure, only to have it snatched away by a cunning adversary?
【From Conquering the Territories to Uniting the World Building the Strongest Sect】
Do you want to take your sect to new heights of power and glory? We've got the ultimate sect management gameplay that lets you experience the full range of sect life: from humble disciple to mighty sect master. Join a massive sect and work your way up from the bottom, or take on the challenge of leading a fallen sect back to prominence.
【Martial Arts, Monsters, and Immortals Building Your Unique School】
To embark on an epic adventure, you need to hone your skills and become a true warrior.

Start by building a solid foundation of cultivation. Your mind skills are crucial to success, so focus on cultivating a powerful mindset. From there, you can delve into martial and spiritual skills to take your abilities to the next level. As you explore, keep an eye out for opportunities to create edges with your motion and special skills. And don't forget to tap into your ultimate skills to save the day when necessary.
【The Triad of Power Artifact, Alchemy, and Talismans】
Sharpen your skills and harness the power of tools!

At the start, you get to choose from three formidable weapons, each offering a distinct cultivation system. The Bagua Jade grants you the ability to revive yourself and your chosen ally, the Eye of Providence allows you to steal Beast Skills and gain unparalleled insights into the world, and the Mythical Gourd empowers you to capture a Boss and enlist it as your loyal sidekick: command it to fight by your side or to search for treasure on your behalf.

Make your visitors happy by offering a range of foods and beverages for purchase at food stalls, creating colored or scented pools, and giving away free floats and swimwear.

You'll be spoiled for choice when customizing your water park, with a wide choice of attractions to build. You can also have both indoor and outdoor pools, so that no matter the weather, your visitors will always have somewhere to splash about in comfort.

us.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

us.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign
Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence

EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT
Access to exclusive offers and discounts!

AWARDS:
• Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018
• As featured on the Gadget Show
• Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024
• App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019
• Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App
• DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year"

CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com

This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

Requires account creation to access content.

*Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full
**Pass Guarantee T&C’s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

tr.description:
Play Hasbro’s official Monopoly board game by yourself, with family and friends or players around the world. Play online or offline on your mobile or tablet. It’s the game you love with no ads!
It's the #1 Paid board game in over 100 countries - with 3 Millions Downloads since launch.

"Monopoly on mobile includes cross-platform online multiplayer, which means you can open up a lobby, have your friends join your games, and all play together in perfect harmony. Beautiful, right?” Dave Aubrey - PocketGamer

This is a fully immersive board game experience with amazing graphics and animations. The whole classic game is available with no ads, so you get the fun of the Monopoly board game without distractions. Invite your friends and family to game night with one of the app stores favourite top paid games.


POPULAR FEATURES
One of the greatest board games 
Play the Hasbro classic Monopoly game by yourself, with family and friends or players around the world on your mobile or tablet!

Full, ad-free game
Play the complete classic game with no pay-to-win or ad pop-ups. Roll the dice and risk it all to become the wealthiest landlord tycoon on the board!

House rules
Put the official Hasbro rule book down and play with your favourite house rules

Quick mode
Roll the dice, risk it all and get paid - finish the board game faster than ever

Single player
Play against our challenging AI - no need for family and friends 

Offline multiplayer 
Pass a single device between up to 4 players for an offline wifi-free experience

Online multiplayer 
Distance doesn’t interrupt play when you connect with fans around the world or invite friends and family to a private game

The Complete Collection 
Be the top landlord tycoon on new themed boards, exclusive to the mobile game. With 10 boards, no 2 games are the same! Risk it all in the L.A. Monstropolis alternate universe. Be spooked in Transylvania. See the future in New York 2121, or travel back in time to Victorian London, Historic Tokyo, Belle Époque era Paris and 1930s Atlantic City! Unlock new player pieces, properties and chance cards with each theme!


HOW TO PLAY
Choose your player mode
Play this classic Hasbro board game in a variety of online and offline player modes. Put your landlord skills to the test against our challenging AI opponents and be a property tycoon in single player mode. Compete with friends and family wherever you are in online multiplayer. Play WiFi-free when you pass & play one device around a group of players. The choice is yours as you buy up the board!

Select your rules
If you’re one of the many people who have never actually read the rules of Monopoly, you can still play the game exactly how you like! Play without auctions, add cash to Free Parking, or pay $400 for landing directly on GO! Choose to stick to the classic Hasbro rule book, get a fixed selection of the most popular house rules, or customise your rules to suit your own preferences! 

Choose your piece
Choose from the modern and classic player pieces, including: scottie, cat, T-rex, rubber duck, the car, the top hat and the battleship!

Enter the board
Experience the thrill of bankrupting your family and friends and becoming the wealthiest landlord tycoon on the board! It’s just as you remember, plus fun animations and an AI banker who’s on everyone’s side!

Build your property empire
Roll the dice, take investment risks, bid for properties in auctions, make your way around the board and BUY real estate, COLLECT rent and BUILD hotels to become a property tycoon.

Play Marmalade Game Studio’s multiplayer games with friends and family wherever you are! Our online games with friends include Clue/Cluedo, The Game of Life, The Game of Life 2 and Battleship.

tr.description:
Ready to kickstart your journey to a healthier you on a budget? Look no further than the Roman app – your ultimate companion for achieving effective weight loss, shedding those extra pounds, and transforming your health without breaking the bank on expensive foods.

Key Features:
• Personalized Meal Plans: Access a diet calculator designed to meet your specific calorie and meal needs while keeping your budget in check. Input your current weight, and you'll receive a detailed meal plan tailored to your budget-friendly weight loss, calorie goals, and fat burning objectives.
• Budget-Savvy Healthy Living: Embrace a healthier lifestyle with tips on nutrition, meal prep, and calorie-conscious choices that won't strain your wallet. Learn how to make every calorie count toward your health, budget weight loss goals, and fat burning efforts, all while enjoying affordable and nutritious food options.
• Progress Tracking: Monitor your budget weight loss journey with built-in tracking features. Keep an eye on your calorie-conscious meal plans, nutrition intake, and your progress towards achieving your ideal weight, all while maximizing fat burning, on a budget.
• Setting and Achieving Goals: Set realistic health and budget-friendly weight loss goals and use the app to track your progress. Stay motivated and accountable on your transformation journey, guided by expert nutritional advice and personalized tips for effective fat burning.
• Budget-Friendly Meal Plans: Optimize your meal plans for cost-effective weight loss, ensuring you're on the right path to achieving your goals without overspending on food. Receive nutritional guidance that makes it easier to maintain a balanced diet while staying within your budget and supporting fat burning.
• Calorie Tracking on a Budget: Keep a close eye on your daily calorie intake and expenditure while staying within your budgetary constraints. Achieve your weight loss and budget health goals without breaking the bank, thanks to our expert nutritional advice, progress monitoring tools, and fat burning insights.
• Wellness and Transformation: Prioritize your wellness journey with our affordable and personalized approach to nutrition and health. Experience a transformation in your overall well-being while staying on budget, supported by effective fat burning strategies.

The Roman app is your go-to solution for achieving a healthier, budget-conscious lifestyle. Say goodbye to costly diets and embrace a budget-friendly approach to weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning. Whether your goal is to lose weight, improve your health, or simply live more frugally while prioritizing your well-being, this app equips you with the tools, personalized guidance, and progress monitoring you need. Start your budget weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning transformation today with the Roman app!

tr.description:
Splish, splash, splosh! The time has come to create some waves and open your very own wet, wonderful (sometimes whacky) water park! Hear that? That’s the sound of super-slippy pool-slide shenanigans. You want in? Of course you do.

Expand your water park, adding exciting facilities, and become the talk of the town. Your visitors will take selfies at your park, generating free publicity for you! Befriend them and they'll send you comments and suggestions.

Make your visitors happy by offering a range of foods and beverages for purchase at food stalls, creating colored or scented pools, and giving away free floats and swimwear.

Collect ingredients and cook foods, then create menus for your food stalls.

You'll be spoiled for choice when customizing your water park, with a wide choice of attractions to build. You can also have both indoor and outdoor pools, so that no matter the weather, your visitors will always have somewhere to splash about in comfort.

Can you create a wonderful water park that everyone will love? Download the game and get started right away!
----
・All game progress is stored on your device. Save data cannot be restored after deleting or reinstalling the app.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp/.
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest Kairosoft news and information.

Design a towering mall of mega proportions! Attract droves of customers and elevate yourself to 5-star status in this mall management simulation game!

Add anything from fast food joints to sushi restaurants, stairs and elevators--even a heliport--all with a touch of the finger!

When your establishment's popularity reaches a certain point, a "Fever" is triggered in which customers swamp your mall! 

You can then exercise your newfound affluence by investing in the surrounding area--bringing in even more customers and being a good citizen at the same time! Oh yeah!

Keep your eyes on the mega-prize--only you can build the ultimate mall!

-- 
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

tr.description:
Develop a lush island full of nature and aim to be the no. 1 resort!

Build accommodation for your guests and get those tourists coming! Make the environment even nicer and discover great travel packages to give visitors the best vacation possible.

Develop the resort to make your guests' dreams come true!

On this ocean island, the sparkling sea is a huge attraction of itself. There's a huge variety of incredible fish waiting to be discovered! Try improving water quality by placing marine plants and rocks in the ocean, and releasing fish you've caught while fishing - you may attract new fishy residents!

Once your resort starts drawing in more tourists, business partners will come asking to open stores and restaurants on your island, and you may even help them create new products! Make sure your resort meets their expectations and you'll both benefit!

Got a juice stand on your island? Why not place a bench next to it? Some things work even better together, becoming feature spots. Discover such winning combinations and watch visitors pour in!

Turn your tropical island into a vacation paradise!

Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp

tr.description:
A new legend begins here!

Build and manage a town in grasslands, snow fields, even in the underworld! Set up inns, weapon stores, and more to convince adventurers to come visit.

Use items and equipment to power up your adventurers and help them get more gold and experience from their quests. Be on the lookout for new dungeons to explore and new monsters to fight!

Need help attracting adventurers? Try building new facilities, selling new kinds of food, or improving the local area to earn Titles. Keep experimenting, and you might stumble on some rare awards...

As your town develops and becomes more popular, adventurers won't just visit, but move in for good!
The enemy roster from the previous game has been expanded with a host of quirky new monsters to fight.

Play your cards right, and some monsters will become friendly and join you! Give them snacks, keep them happy, and they'll become valuable allies on your quests. Explore more and more of the world map to unlock new areas.

Feel like a fresh start? Move your town to a different region to discover unseen monsters and bold new adventurers.

Rise through the ranks and create the greatest town the kingdom has ever seen!

Zoom in or adjust the screen size with touch controls.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation.

Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions.

Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills.

As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform!
Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer.

Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry!
--
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. 
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Build your own resort and propel it to success with but a touch of the finger in this one-of-a-kind simulation!

Rooms, restaurants, arcades, and baths--position each facility to lull your guests into hot spring Nirvana and skyrocket your establishment to fame!

Craft the perfect Japanese garden from lanterns, pine trees, azaleas, and more--you'll need it all if you want to attract VIPs like pop stars and novelists.

There can only be one #1! Do you have what it takes?

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

tr.description:
Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more in the world’s most trusted digital journal. 

“Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times

“Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired

“This superb journaling app remains pleasant to behold, easy to use, and a tough act for any rival to follow.” – Macworld

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original journal app and a decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling platform in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE

• Beautiful, award-winning design
• Unlimited text entries 
• Unlimited photos and videos*
• Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
• Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 

• Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
• End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
• Journal entries stay secure with passcode or TouchID
• Export options (pdf, plain text, JSON, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 

• Programmable reminder notifications
• Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp 
• Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
• Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER

• Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
• The ability to email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING

• On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
• Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for
• Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and sync are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today.
